ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you. You wouldn t happen to know the formula for making metal sheets, not the folded sheets but the ones used to make banded. I know it was broken but I
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you. You wouldn't happen to know the formula for making metal sheets,
not the folded sheets but the ones used to make banded. I know it was broken
but I have seen on a few boards that its now working.
Silver

> -----Original Message-----
> From: San Wong [SMTP:san@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 5:02 PM
> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Studs and Bonding
>
> From: "San Wong" <san@...>
>
> For the steel boning it takes 1 file 1 small brick (block) of ore and 1
> water flask.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: McConnell, Jeff <Jeff.McConnell@...>
